name: get_all_bodies_positions
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool astronomy.
Tool description: A data retrieval interface for the skies... (visit astronomyapi.com and obtain your free API key)
API description: Fetches the positions of celestial bodies for a given location and date range using the Astronomy API.

latitude.description: The latitude of the location for which to get the positions.

longitude.description: The longitude of the location for which to get the positions.

from_date.description: The start date for the observation period in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

to_date.description: The end date for the observation period in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

elevation.description: The elevation of the location in meters. Defaults to 166.

time.description: The specific time of day for the observation in the format 'HH:MM:SS'. Defaults to '12:00:00'.
